info.gloss: person of reprehensible morals; immoral; adulterer

extraWords: Lao Ai (-238 BC), man of Qin famous for his giant penis; in fiction, bogus eunuch and the consort of king Ying Zheng's mother lady Zhao
see historical character Lao Ai 嫪毐; by extension, person of reprehensible morals; immoral; adulterer
